description.value: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can’t reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.
The kraken makes three Tentacle attacks. It can replace one Tentacle attack with a Bite attack.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature &Reference[grappled]{grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is &Reference[blinded]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes [[/damage 12d6 acid average]] damage at the start of each of the kraken’s turns.

If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a [[/save con 24 format=long]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall &Reference[prone]{prone} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 22). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 30-foot-radius centered on the kraken. The cloud spreads around corners, and the area is heavily obscured. Each creature in the area when it first appears must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that enters the ink cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] save or take [[/damage 2d10 poison average]] damage and be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} until the start of its next turn. The cloud lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong current.

affects.special: Must be grappled by the kracken

description.value: One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes [[/damage 1d6 bludgeoning average]] damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take the same damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.
The kraken pulls up to two creatures grappled by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swims up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls bolts of lightning to strike up to two creatures it can see or sense within 120 feet of it. Each creature must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
